name: Chickens and the Foxes
description:
Play as a chick or a fox or watch above as the two animals try and survive, chickens will win if there are more than 2 chickens when the timer runs out.

Click on the animal to control it!

Once controlled you can move with WASD or arrows or tap the arrows on screen, but make sure to drink.

Enjoy!

Credit to: AurynSky for some of the art
